amendment.description: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for the Federal Emergency Management Agency's Emergency Food and Shelter program by $30 million and reduce funds for the NASA Human Space Flight program by $43 million.

action.text: Mr. Lewis (CA) raised a point of order against the Vento amendment (A011). Mr. Lewis (CA) stated that the amendment constituted an unauthorized appropriations and was, therefore, in violation of the rules of the House. The Chair sustained the point of order.
